Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Line2D
      • java.awt.geom.Line2D.Double
        • Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Line
extends java.awt.geom.Line2D.Double
    Simple wrapper class to wrap a 2D Line. Simply converts int x,y pairs to doubles.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2)
        Constructor for a line from (x1,y1) to (x2,y2).
        Parameters:
        x1 - - x location of one end of the line
        y1 - - y location of one end of the line
        x2 - - x location of the other end of the line
        y2 - - y location of the other end of the line

      • Line

        public Line(int x1,
            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2,
            java.awt.Color _color)
        Constructor for a line from (x1,y1) to (x2,y2). Allows the color to be given.
        Parameters:
        x1 - - x location of one end of the line
        y1 - - y location of one end of the line
        x2 - - x location of the other end of the line
        y2 - - y location of the other end of the line
        _color - the color for the line

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
